text: Ani kahi loka asehi aheta je dusaryanna allahaca sahabhagi tharavuna tyancyasi ase prema rakhatata, jase prema allahasi asayala have ani imanadharaka tara allahasi prema rakhanyata mothe sakta asatata. Murtipujaka lokanni he janale asate tara! Vastavika allahacya siksa- yatana pahuna (januna ghetila) ki sarva prakarace samarthya allahalaca ahe ani allaha sakta azaba (siksa-yatana) denara ahe. (Tara kadhihi murtipuja keli nasati)
